venue.name: The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center

item.description:
ZUMBA TONING + CORE: Zumba Toning with more routines that focus on the core.  So come give those abs a workout without laying on the floor!

Bring Water, towel, and sneakers without a lot of tread and 1-3 Lb weights.

Featuring: Salsa, Cumbia, Merengue, Flamenco, Samba, Belly Dance, Tango, Hip Hop, Raggae, Raggaeton, Bachata, Quebradita, Indian, Rock-N-Roll, R&B Grooves, Abs, Body Sculpting, Boxing, and who knows what else!). $5 Drop in Fee; $40 for 10-Class Card. 

 

Directions: I-84 West, Sission Avenue Exit, Take a left on Sission Ave. Take a left on Capitol Ave. The 3rd right is Arbor St.  It is in the same buildingas Real Artways.  Use the side green door entrance.  There is plenty of parking in the back.
item.how_to_find_us: We are in the same building as The Real Artways

group.name: Zumba Fitness @ The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center

item.name: Zumba Toning+Core in Hartford CT
